## Expectation.toThrow() method

Calls the provided function and expects an error to be thrown. The message of the error is also checked.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
toThrow(this: Expectation<() => any>, message: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  this | [Expectation](./earljs.expectation.md)<!-- -->&lt;() =&gt; any&gt; |  |
|  message | string | string or matcher to check the message against. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
